Personalized recommendations: Implementing a recommendation engine that suggests products based on the customer's browsing and purchase history can help increase sales and customer satisfaction.
Virtual try-on: Developing a virtual try-on feature that allows customers to see how a product would look on them before making a purchase can increase customer confidence and reduce return rates.
Gamification: Creating a gamified shopping experience that rewards customers for their purchases and encourages them to keep coming back can increase customer loyalty and drive repeat business.
Augmented reality: Incorporating augmented reality technology into the shopping experience can allow customers to visualize products in 3D and make more informed purchasing decisions.

Social media integration: Integrating social media into the e-commerce store can allow customers to share their purchases and shopping experiences with their friends and followers, increasing brand visibility and driving new sales.
